Posts.Content: Hiya I think youre right im thinking every twinge is a new growth.. ill be glad when ive had another MRI and bone scan.. and then the surgery on the 20th.. hopefully it will save my life x Thankyou for your support DonDon xx
Posts.Title: Waiting for surgery

Posts.Content: Hi everyone, im new on here and terrified. I was diagnosed with stage 3 multifocal breast cancer with majority lymph node involvement on 18 Dec, due to a chest infection my surgery was delayed 5 weeks, im now 10 weeks post diagnosis and feel like this inside me could be spreading everywhere. Im having a nipple ans skin sparing mastectomy with lymph node clearance with chemo and radiotherapy. I am having terrible shoulder and arm pain: could this be due to the lymph involvement. Any advice and support is very welcome x
Posts.Title: Waiting for surgery

Posts.Content: Thankyou so much for your support.. i really appreciate it right nowÂ  DonDon
